channel.title: John Duncan
channel.description: Recent news about John Duncan, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Cowichan Valley Citizen
item.description:
New Democrat MPs join parade of politicians through Valley
First it was John Duncan - Conservative MP for Vancouver Island North, who made a $157,000 funding announcement at Rotary Park on Wednesday last week. Then it was federal NDP Leader Tom Mulcair who joined Nanaimo-Cowichan MP Jean Crowder ...

item.title: Mentioned by Cowichan Valley Citizen
item.description:
UPDATED: Conservatives leaving local MP off guest list to riding events
Last week Conservative MP John Duncan (North Island) was in town to make two federal funding announcements and Crowder, the Government of Canada's official member of Parliament for the area, was left off the guest list both times. "In the first couple ...

Funding announced for fisheries restoration

item.description:
Duncan announces $157000 upgrade for Rotary Park
John Duncan, Minister of State and Member of Parliament for Vancouver Island North, joined Duncan Mayor Phil Kent at the park on Wednesday morning to announce the government funds. "Our government is committed to creating jobs, growth and longterm ...
